title: Legacy client not launching?
body:
Im trying to launch the legacy client but it wont launch
(the new client is too laggy)

replies.body:
Its my problem too so can anyone tell me what to do? pls
(or impelmemt bots in custom games)
well, what i did was delete the new and old client from my computer/laptop then re-installed.

mine wont launch either AND it keeps telling me i have the wrong name/password....even tho i can log in fine on the boards. what the actual #$%@.....first it wont connect to games and now the client isn't working at all...have run repairs and everything.
This happened to me last night, and it didn't work at all for me. So I waited for my internet to fix itself and then it worked.
yeah, i did the full repair, i can log in just fine on the new client, but the old one i cant even open up (when i did it said an unspecified error occured)

There are a few ways to return to the legacy client:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

If you are still receiving an error let me know and when exactly it's happening.  If you run into any trouble let me know!
I am having the same problem now. But I have Mac (aka a toaster) so the file is called lol_launcher. What would I do after that?
